channel.title: ~{Project Cadmium Isle}~ (New Update)
channel.description:
[CENTER][FONT=Impact][SIZE=5]Project Cadmium Isle[/SIZE][/FONT] [FONT=Fixedsys][SIZE=3]By: Rich Dude (Forbidden)[/SIZE][/FONT][/CENTER] [FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=3][B]Well thanks everyone for looking and I hope you enjoy my Development Blog + Information about my Server Project.[/B][/SIZE][/FONT] [font=Century Gothic][i]Note: My msn: erbeeler@gmail.com. Feel free to add it![/i][/font] [FONT=Century Gothic][I]The entire server was coded entirely by me, except for some help by friends. View the bottom for credits. The entire server is going to have [b][size=13pt]custom maps[/size][/b], therefore the players will be visiting places and seeing areas never before seen, in any server or Runescape, for that matter![/I][/FONT] To view previous updates, and their full pictures go below to "Past Updates":
[FONT=Century Gothic][B]Latest Update:[/B][/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic] Finally, I mean finally completed Cadmium Isle! (90% done) [/FONT] [b]Don't want to see the pictures here, view a SlideShow Online:[/b] [url=http://cid-e34a9e7cdd7082bf.skydrive.live.com/play.aspx/Cadmium%20Isle?ref=1]Click here[/url] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/xomujm.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/25hd2fb.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/352iw44.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/1jw7ba.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/11jluh4.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2n1uowg.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/20hn0hs.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/28ahyyf.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/egb8mq.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/28kppg5.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2vvnqso.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/20ucoit.jpg[/img] [B][FONT=Century Gothic] To view a slideshow of Past Updates, click on the Update Below! [/FONT][/B]
[FONT=Century Gothic][B]Video:[/B][/FONT]
[FONT=Century Gothic]Not yet created.[/FONT]
[FONT=Century Gothic][B]Past Updates:[/B][/FONT]
-[url=http://cid-e34a9e7cdd7082bf.skydrive.live.com/play.aspx/Tutorial%20Isle?ref=1]Full Tutorial Island + Beta Island.[/url] (Click For Pictures) -[url=http://i41.tinypic.com/zj9sfp.jpg]Added Perfect Fishing[/url] (Click for Picture) -None -None
[FONT=Century Gothic][B]Of course, Development Blog:[/B][/FONT]
[FONT=Century Gothic][b] Monday, April 12th, 2009: [/b] [/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Today, I was not able to do much, however I fixed a major glitch causing the maps the not be shown :eek:. No worrys, its gone :D. Also I had someone login, and I realized that due to the Base being RichScape V.4 my stability needs some work, so I am wishing to dedicate some time to that. Besides that, I am ready to begin coding, and hopefully I can do some late tonight. Anyway, I lastly added a base to the Cadmium Isle actual island, and I am excited to work on it, but since its the MAIN island, I want to dedicate atleast a week mapping it out![/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic][b] Saturday, April 11th, 2009: [/b] [/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Today, I finally finished Tutorial Island. Adding the 75% of Woodcutting, Fishing, and Cooking into the server. Firemaking is just a base at the moment. Tutorial Isle is obviously done, therefore allowing me to finally design my "Cadmium Isle" or "Home" area into the server. I am very excited, to finally break away from the coding and design a worthwhile area for my server.[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic][b] Saturday, April 18th, 2009: [/b] [/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Its been a week since my last post, but I still feel that progress has been made. Take a look at the newest update, and you'll undertstand. See, people and server developers take the objects, walls, and such already put into their server for granted. In a custom server, everything must be designed by me, the terrain, the houses, the walls, the maps, I even have to place a potted plant in the bank. Everything must be spawned 1 by 1, so what is already there for a regular server, may take me 3+ hours to make it into my server. But since I did that, it makes this server special, and like no other. Thats why BETA will be soon, and I encourage all to sign-up![/FONT]
[B][FONT=Century Gothic]Current Progress: [/FONT][/B] [B][FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=3][COLOR=#ff0000]Overall Server Progress: (45%)[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/B] [FONT=Century Gothic][U]Skills:[/U][/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Thieving -----> [COLOR=green]95%[/COLOR][/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Fishing -------> [COLOR=green]95%[/COLOR][/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Cooking ---> [COLOR=green]95%[/COLOR][/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Attack, Strength, Defense ----> [COLOR=green]80%[/COLOR][/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Woodcutting ----> [COLOR=green]80%[/COLOR][/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic][FONT=Century Gothic]Range ----> [COLOR=green]75%[/COLOR][/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic][FONT=Century Gothic]Prayer ----> [COLOR=green]75%[/COLOR][/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Firemaking ----> [COLOR=green]70%[/COLOR][/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Magic ----> [COLOR=red]50%[/COLOR][/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Mineing --> [COLOR=red]20[/COLOR][/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Smithing -> [COLOR=red]20%[/COLOR][/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Slayer ------> [COLOR=red]0%[/COLOR][/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Farming --> [COLOR=red]0%[/COLOR][/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Crafting --> [COLOR=red]0%[/COLOR][/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Fletching -> [COLOR=red]0%[/COLOR][/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]Agility ------> [COLOR=red]0%[/COLOR][/FONT] Runecraft --> [COLOR=red]0%[/COLOR] [FONT=Century Gothic][FONT=Century Gothic]Herblore -->[COLOR=red] 0%[/COLOR][/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic][U]Quests:[/U][/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic][FONT=Century Gothic]Quest 1 ------> [COLOR=red]0%[/COLOR][/FONT] Quest 2 ------> [COLOR=red]0%[/COLOR] [FONT=Century Gothic][FONT=Century Gothic]Quest 3 ------>[COLOR=red] 0%[/COLOR][/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic][U]Maps:[/U][/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic][FONT=Century Gothic]Tutorial Island ------> [COLOR=green]100%[/COLOR][/FONT] Cadmium Isle ------>[COLOR=green] 90%[/COLOR] [FONT=Century Gothic][B]Other Information:[/B][/FONT]
[FONT=Century Gothic]-I am looking for a nice Logo Image, if you are interested please add my MSN: [EMAIL="erbeeler@gmail.com"]erbeeler@gmail.com[/EMAIL].[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]-Also I would like to open Alpha Testing (Simple Skills + Bug Testing), sometime in the month of April, please look toward that, and pay attention for the announcement.[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]-All ideas/suggestions/criticem is accepted and [U]appreciated[/U] feel free to post on this thread, or if you'd like add my MSN: [EMAIL="erbeeler@gmail.com"]erbeeler@gmail.com[/EMAIL]. [/FONT]
[FONT=Century Gothic][B]Support Us:[/B][/FONT]
[FONT=Century Gothic] Add in your signature![/FONT] [code][url=http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,359848.0.html]I support Project Cadmium Isle![/url][/code] For other forums, a picture support! [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/vpi9sn.gif[/img] [code][IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/vpi9sn.gif[/IMG][/code]
[FONT=Century Gothic][B]And Credits:[/B][/FONT]
[FONT=Century Gothic]Credits:[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]-Lucas (MAJOR Help)[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]-Icey Whip (Help)[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]-JV (Interface Tutorial)[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]-'Rich (Server Base)[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]-Galkon (Client Base)[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]-Peterbjornx (Map Editor)[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]--Ethan (Help)[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]--Whitefang (Help)[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]--Cezzur Development Team (Help w/ Loading Objects)[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]-Cory {nelson} (Taught me Map Editor)[/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic]-And many more...[/FONT]
